column1: This year Georgia 🍑 was won by a Democratic presidential ticket for the first time since 1992. If we keep up that same momentum we can elect Jon @Ossoff and @ReverendWarnock and finally take back control of the Senate -- and our future. Read more >> https://t.co/6jaPnpvulE https://t.co/r8kLH6Qbfy

2020 has been the most deadly year for trans and gender-nonconforming folks. Today Transgender Day of Remembrance we grieve for those we lost and recommit to protecting the community from all forms of violence. Remember their names >> https://t.co/bDkTrzVl0d https://t.co/CV29UFCJ0g

The results from 2 different COVID-19 vaccine clinical trials are showing overwhelmingly positive results. This is a great first step to building confidence with the public. Read more >> https://t.co/aZ0GM8xdFR https://t.co/7FiNMILeey

Colorado just like nearly every state across the nation is experiencing a surge of COVID-19 cases. Work from home if you are able. Go out in public as sparingly as possible wear your mask and practice social distancing. Read more >> https://t.co/eCGyUvL3PF https://t.co/X8nW1jh6YE

As chair of the House Energy and Commerce Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee Diana is ensuring that all safety and efficacy standards and precautions are being met. This is a huge milestone -- but there's still work to do before distribution. https://t.co/S1fXL1b2Q5 https://t.co/s4mkfiIPnO

Thank you @staceyabrams. Stacey is one of the many Black women who built an infrastructure in Georgia that allowed @JoeBiden to go toe-to-toe with Trump and @Ossoff and @RaphaelWarnock to head to runoffs for the U.S. Senate. Read more >>  https://t.co/xPXKrO9H42 https://t.co/soTUX2Tv3o

While I may be the first woman in this office I will not be the last. Because every little girl watching tonight sees that this is a country of possibilities. Truly moving words from VP-elect @KamalaHarris. Watch her entire speech here >> https://t.co/R84S02KAWy https://t.co/Hvc2blL8BK

Thank you to all veterans across Colorado and the country who selflessly served this nation. I will not stop working to fulfill the promise made to you -- to provide medical care and mental health treatment job placement and the hard-earned benefits that you so deserve.

To each and every one of you who advocated organized and refused to allow hate and division to be this nation's north star — thank you. Read Diana's note here » https://t.co/wvzh4uRrDV https://t.co/o62aWOjLY9
I am honored and excited to get to work for the American people with President-Elect @JoeBiden and Vice President-Elect @KamalaHarris #copolitics #BidenHarris2020
Congratulations to the new Speaker of the Colorado House of Representatives @AlecGarnett! #copolitics
Election are about counting votes. It's really that simple. #RewardsForPatience
We are delighted to have you on the team. Together we can do great things for Colorado. https://t.co/Fhuk7Gv6RX
It is important that every vote is counted. We are in a great position to win this election for @JoeBiden. Patience is difficult but important. I'm feeling good about where we are this morning.

Thank you to the voters of Congressional District one for entrusting me with another term. I feel confident that we will have a mandate in the House to work on important issues like climate change access to health care and increasing the minimum wage #copolitics
Power back on at MLK Library. Thank you everyone for the prompt attention!
Please take note. If you were planning to vote at MLK Library before about 3:15 please go to one of these other locations. https://t.co/XwwnL0ZImz

Today is the final day to do your civic duty and ensure that we defeat Donald Trump once and for all.   If you have not already voted make a plan to vote safely >>  https://t.co/uS0IPy8SVu https://t.co/Zy3jnEXfjR

.@JoeBiden @KamalaHarris and @Hickenlooper need our help right now more than ever so we can't take our foot off the gas for even one second.  Make a plan to vote now >> https://t.co/eQTx16OdWf  Read more >> https://t.co/FraGfGLt7x
If you're voting in person -- vote safely. Make sure you wear a mask bring hand sanitizer and maintain social distancing in line.    Make a plan >> https://t.co/uBe5hecrY1 https://t.co/OSGk3ET0Ms

I'm doing everything I can to help vulnerable Democrats nationwide. Chip in before our FINAL end of month deadline on October 31 so we can take our country back >> https://t.co/JQkjimveMr https://t.co/8GScdPMxw4

Waiting periods. Gag orders. 1 clinic per surrounding 700 miles. So many laws restrict abortion access around this country -- and we can't let Prop 115 pass in Colorado. Vote NO on this backward anti-women anti-science referendum >>  https://t.co/24Id5fFtTH https://t.co/oVGJLus2ou
Women's issues are on the ballot. Get those ballots in Colorado! #DropItOffCO https://t.co/bYAtMOVCLH

Amy Coney Barrett's entire confirmation process was a sham by Trump and Senate Republicans. Defeating their agenda next week is one of the many ways we hold them accountable. Make sure you have a plan to vote >> https://t.co/eQTx16OdWf

Right now our country needs a president.  A president who’s in it not for himself but for others. One who doesn’t divide us — but unites us. We need a president who appeals not to the worst in us — but to the best » https://t.co/l4L2IfqpDf https://t.co/4e0nSdsynb

Remember it's now too late to mail your ballot but Colorado has more than 300 drop off locations. Find a drop off location in your county at https://t.co/EriYUAvQa2. Let's get those ballots in for @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris and @Hickenlooper  #DropItOffCO https://t.co/Ob7VnMdjUi
Important reminders. https://t.co/Ifh0GkDQ53
During a rare weekend session the Republican-controlled Senate just advanced RBG's replacement rather than COVID-19 relief talks or voting on HEROES Act. This is appalling » https://t.co/f44Qiy0ht1

If this proposition passes it will be the beginning of abortion rights being chipped away in our state. I couldn't agree more! The right to a safe legal abortion cannot be undermined. Make sure that you vote NO on Proposition 115 » https://t.co/WskxKVz5tO

A little snow doesn't stop the @JoeBiden Soul of the Nation Bus in Colorado. Also thanks to @RosenbergsBagel at Stanley Marketplace for the takeout lunch! Remember turn in those ballots! #DropItOffCO @SoulofTheNationCO https://t.co/BWKJVWU0j3

COLORADO: the last day to register to vote online or return your ballot by mail is 10/26! After 10/26 you can return your ballot at a drop box or in-person polling location! Register to vote online now >> https://t.co/i9YlMf8mf2 https://t.co/8kn6lVTcwu
Today I cast by ballot for @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris @Hickenlooper and Democrats up and down the ballot. Make a plan and #DropItOffCO https://t.co/JfupLXc4C6
More devastating fires in Colorado underscore how important it is that we vote to save our planet before it's too late.   Read more >> https://t.co/N1cqiVLPF6 https://t.co/Rtg8umkXbA

CO -- have you checked your mailbox recently? Your ballot could be in there. We had record turnout in the primary this summer and need to keep up that same momentum!   Once you fill out and return your ballot you can track it here >> https://t.co/KixxmZS4NB https://t.co/PbCay3wQFc

Rather than tuning in to the second presidential debate which Trump refused to participate in I'll be watching Joe Biden's town hall tonight on ABC. Watch tonight's town hall here >> https://t.co/lzgnnDR1xR

I am deeply troubled by Proposition 115 the latest attempt by Colorado Republicans to limit access to abortion and will be voting against it when I make my voice heard. Abortion is a matter of constitutional consensus and public health » https://t.co/7zydumgh5o https://t.co/a1WaC80p8t

Every day is Indigenous Peoples' Day but today is a day to respect and celebrate Indigenous culture. Our great state is home to several tribes who have left an imprint on our state and I re-commit to always defend and protect our Indigenous communities. https://t.co/RvVMw0d9o4
Keep a close eye on your mailbox 📪  over the next few days because ballots just dropped!   #MailTheVoteCO

This is a great step to ensuring that young athletes have a positive experience without pressures to use performance-enhancing drugs. Read more on my legislation in anticipation of the 2028 Olympic Games » https://t.co/w4CwLOlXBL

I'm excited to be supporting a woman as strong brilliant and inspiring as @KamalaHarris in tonight's Vice Presidential debate. Show her you have her back by recording and sending in a short video >> https://t.co/b5HZyPMI87  #GoodLuckKamala https://t.co/TuBseudYgD

Hispanic residents are 20% more likely than white residents to die of treatable conditions   Disparities in housing employment access to healthy food and medical care as well as medical racism are daily realities for some Coloradans. Read more >> https://t.co/RSIJrt9VVH

One of the ways you can honor the legacy of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg is by protecting the right to a safe legal and accessible abortion here in Colorado. Make a donation in her honor to the @CobaltAdvocates. Donate here >>  https://t.co/vH1QXEBvP7

As we make developments for a #COVID19 vaccine I'm talking with public health experts & scientists to ensure sure we're taking the steps to meet the requirements & safety precautions before distribution -- the American people deserve nothing less » https://t.co/UDKx2jjtWo https://t.co/U0qh8bJVUB

Three years have passed since the Las Vegas shooting and Senate Republicans and the Trump administration still refuse to pass commonsense gun violence prevention legislation. This is unacceptable. Victims survivors and their families deserve better: https://t.co/tVlVtTzZlS

Trump is incompetent and dangerous. Ballots drop NEXT WEEK so it's never been more important for every one of us to vote -- our rights depend on it.   Make sure you're registered to vote >> https://t.co/ZdKMEwtC3U
It's easy. I condemn White Supremacy. I #pledge to stand against those like @realDonaldTrump who refuse to do so.
After seeing the debate last night it is clear that we need @JoeBiden in the White House. #copolitics https://t.co/ogX0QgJYWQ
Tonight begins #YomKippur the holiest day in the Hebrew calendar. G'mar hatimah tova to all observing -- may you have an easy meaningful fast.
Here's a great comprehensive list from @9NEWS of everything you need to know about voting in Colorado this year!  #GoVoteColorado  https://t.co/1y6MxhlUNi

Colorado — if you received a national pre-election mailer from @USPS with guidance about requesting your absentee ballot disregard. 🚨 If you are an eligible registered voter in CO your ballot will be mailed automatically! 🚨 » https://t.co/pJ7ef7x8U4
On Friday we lost Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg a powerful and brilliant American hero — and I am devastated. But our fight to continue her legacy will power on » https://t.co/qVgOndRgZt
Shanah Tovah and Shabbat Shalom to all observing #RoshHashanah! 🍎🍯 #5781

The best way to keep yourself and your fellow Coloradans safe is to continue to #maskup maintain social distancing and be sure to get your annual flu shot.   https://t.co/KMwUHFxiHg https://t.co/93gBagHpJF
The recent forest fires across the Western states show the real-life effects of climate change but the Trump administration would tell you otherwise.   https://t.co/kLAaCT8Ybo https://t.co/0sx0trDhlJ
Thank you for the support @SEIU105. I am proud to stand by your side as we fight for better working conditions living wages and racial and economic justice. https://t.co/Q1Fm43ICXl

.@KamalaHarris is a leader a fighter and will make an amazing Vice President. I'm incredibly excited to work hard so that the #BidenHarris ticket wins in November.  https://t.co/V1Yw2JLBHd https://t.co/ZbtopH0aUl
Organized labor is the backbone of our workforce and has held the country together during the COVID-19 pandemic. I'll always stick by our union leaders and wish everyone a Happy Labor Day!
Had a great time with @AlfreWoodard @BriannaforCO @MLoachamin and @EmergeColorado celebrating our next Vice President @KamalaHarris. #WomenforBidenHarris  https://t.co/moG5c7ExBO
Although we NEVER should've left in the first place it's time for the United States to re-join our allies and enter back into the Paris Climate Agreement. https://t.co/Ns1uyFPkCb

Victims of Hurricane Laura are not only facing catastrophic effects of the natural disaster and climate change but of COVID-19 as well.   A comprehensive list of how to aid victims of Hurricane Laura in Louisiana and Texas can be found here >> https://t.co/llzLSUKqcW

There is a lot at stake in this election. And especially a lot at stake for women. As we mark 100 years from the adoption of the 19th Amendment make a plan to vote and drop off your ballot early! Text VOTE to 30330 now. #WomensEqualityDay
I am horrified by the shooting in Kenosha WI. Our country must do better. Black Lives Matter.

Tonight the Republican National Convention will kick-off in Charlotte. The best way to fight division is with unity. Check your voter registration status so you're prepared to vote against the hateful Republican agenda when ballots drop >> https://t.co/MedtywkfTX

Ahead of ballots dropping in less than two months — make sure you've checked your voter registration status. You can also check the status of your ballot thanks to @COSecofState >>  https://t.co/MedtywkfTX #IWillVote #ColoradoVotes

For every $1 earned by a white man: Black women earn $0.62 Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander women $0.61 American Indian or Alaska Native women $0.57 and Hispanic or Latina women $0.54. Learn more here >> https://t.co/uf7HVBet0s
Join other Coloradans at a virtual convention watch party and special Colorado pre-programs tonight » https://t.co/ZJ8A6zKGLP https://t.co/DMfMUFfBdk

The Postal Service is the only affordable lifeline that assures essential goods services and ballots arrive in a timely manner--and protects your privacy. Join me in demanding that Trump keep his hands off the United States Postal Service. >>>https://t.co/jLskeMwxux https://t.co/VSOwMHphV3

The Democratic Convention starts tomorrow night! Although it will be different than we imagined I cannot wait to watch this historic event on TV. Which nights will you be tuning in? #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/AgfS9lDUZv

If we don't ensure census data is collected properly the consequences will last for the next decade and Black communities and other communities of color will be disproportionately harmed. We cannot end the counting operation early. https://t.co/YVMiaih6Pg

The Social Security Act was signed into law 85 years ago today. By signing this bill President Roosevelt promised hard-working Americans they'd have a safety net when they retired. As your Congresswoman I promise to always protect your hard-earned Social Security benefits.

3 years ago this week white supremacists rallied in Charlottesville stoking hatred + fear. Tragically Heather Heyer a counter-protestor was killed by a neo-Nazi. This was horrific but we can -- and must -- honor Heather's memory by creating a just + inclusive America today.

Thank you for your kind words Paige Lewis! I too am grateful the Great American Outdoors Act was signed into law and look forward to what it will bring to Colorado and the rest of the country. I'm proud to have been a strong supporter of this legislation. https://t.co/4KW9ZGOZ74

Congratulations to our next Vice President @KamalaHarris! Senator Harris is a true public servant and will make a fantastic Vice President. I'm thrilled that we have our ticket and that for the first time ever a Black woman will be on it. Now let's go win this!
I'm excited to help elect #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/wZe86yiUpg
The answer is "no." No matter what President Trump says we will NOT postpone the election. https://t.co/sYenS9M52b

Six years ago today Michael Brown was shot and killed by a police officer in Ferguson. His tragic death helped spark the Black Lives Matter movement. Today and every day let us #SayHisName. Rest in power Michael Brown #BlackLivesMatter

Glad to see this bill has passed in the Senate. It will help address the culture of sexual abuse in the Olympics and protect athletes from harm. I'm co-sponsoring a companion bill in the House and I'm hopeful it will be passed and signed into law quickly. https://t.co/lOKifEzcZJ

Today -- on the 55th anniversary of the original Voting Rights Act -- I hope you'll join me in calling on Mitch McConnell to bring the John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act up for vote in the Senate. The right to vote is sacred and we must protect it.

Small mom and pop shops are hurting because of a trade dispute between two of the largest companies in the world. In the middle of an economic recession I think small business owners already have enough to worry about. I am urging the USTR to take action. https://t.co/0G1TUoSqTd

Happy birthday President @BarackObama! I am looking forward to honoring your legacy on November 3rd when we elect @JoeBiden president expand our majority in the House and flip the Senate blue #YesWeCan

Trump's dismissal of John Lewis is disgusting. When we lost Congressman John Lewis we lost a fighter and a legend. We lost the conscience of the Congress. His character and integrity unified our nation for the better -- I can't say the same for Trump. https://t.co/UHzQ9Htpmt

If you need more evidence that voting by mail is safe and secure: look no further than to our great state of Colorado. We've been voting by mail since 2013 and guess what? It works.  https://t.co/nm0GqeRZU8 https://t.co/2vpJbHOh8t

The public deserves to know how COVID-19 vaccines are progressing. That's why I led a hearing to learn from companies about their efforts. I was glad to hear the process is going well and the vaccine makers pledged not to sacrifice safety for speed.   https://t.co/hXTcy8VwR1 https://t.co/ScTiAi82xp

The Helms Amendment is a racist and anti-women piece of legislation. It's past time we repealed it so I'm co-sponsoring the first-ever legislation to do just that. #RepealHelms #AbortionIsHealthCare #HelmsHurts   https://t.co/c6586NM1cI https://t.co/xioIoobd3e

President Trump does NOT have the authority to move the election. His suggesting otherwise is a dangerous and unprecedented power grab at denying you YOUR rights during a pandemic. He's willing to do anything to stay in office. We must take this threat to our Democracy seriously.

I'm honored to be endorsed by @NewtownAction. Addressing gun violence will always be a top priority of mine and I'm proud to have supported numerous pieces of gun safety legislation in the House. McConnell must stop blocking these reforms in the Senate. https://t.co/AFzLZPQSZG

Coloradans can't wait any longer for a renewed financial relief package. The HEROES Act would provide critical support but it's been on McConnell's desk since May. Enough. The Senate must pass the HEROES Act. The bill introduced this week doesn't cut it. https://t.co/a0d6XvshpB

The request for federal agents to come to Colorado is nothing more than a political stunt to distract from President Trump's failures. Our state does NOT need federal law enforcement intervention. We need President Trump to stop fomenting violence.  https://t.co/zsuG9aYuQu

I was proud to introduce bipartisan legislation last month to support the research community during COVID-19. We need to preserve our scientific infrastructure and protect our innovation pipeline to help us better respond to future pandemics. https://t.co/8jFcf82K59 https://t.co/k8cOagXcRb

Great progress is being made towards developing a vaccine for COVID-19 but we need to prepare now to ensure the American people can access and afford it once it becomes available. That’s why I’ve called for a nationwide vaccine program. https://t.co/6XZdVgNRVi https://t.co/QGlmNMjwnO

A year ago the House passed the PRIDE Act. This bill would update the tax code to provide equal treatment for same sex married couples. It's a sensible and just bill and yet it still sits on Mitch McConnell's desk. That's unacceptable. We need to sign the PRIDE act into law.

21 years ago today Shuttle mission STS-93 launched into space making Eileen Marie Collins the first female commander of a U.S. Spacecraft. Eileen is an inspiration to us all and a reminder to young girls everywhere that they should aim for the stars.

I am honored to be recognized as a 2020 Medicare Advantage Champion. This is a critical program that needs to be protected and expanded upon. Health care is a right and we need to look out for our seniors now more than ever. https://t.co/UzIVrWMPc6

I am thrilled that our amendment to protect 1.3 million acres of wilderness was included in the defense spending bill that passed in the House on Tuesday. I will never stop fighting to protect our environment and public lands. https://t.co/T3QBwfLG8d

I am proud to endorse @Hickenlooper for Senate. We have the votes in the House to pass important legislation but the bills stall in the Republican-controlled Senate. It's time to end McConnell's reign as Majority Leader and send Cory Gardner packing! https://t.co/7wfebJ6LRT https://t.co/1C8o1hfDq8

Eight years ago twelve Coloradans lost their lives in an Aurora movie theatre. Today in their honor and the honor of so many other victims of gun violence let us recommit ourselves to the fight to end gun violence once and for all.

The restoration of Voting Rights Act was passed to continue fighting for civil rights — and McConnell is stalling it in the Senate. We may honor John Lewis' legacy by voting and ensuring every eligible voter can exercise their right too. https://t.co/ACzvcmmZnt https://t.co/MHJ56hCA4j

My daughter lives with Type 1 diabetes so lowering the skyrocketing cost of insulin is personal. And as Co-Chair of the Congressional Caucus on Diabetes I'm paying close attention to the new challenges Americans with diabetes are facing during COVID-19 https://t.co/F10mGx0rxP https://t.co/hs6jqQGhWU

Heartbroken by the loss of my friend & colleague John Lewis. We must carry on his fight & honor his legacy with action - by voting & ensuring others can vote.  Mitch McConnell must bring the John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act to the Senate Floor immediately.

Trump administration rescinds rule requiring foreign students to attend in-person classes or leave U.S. >> https://t.co/D3JFseIav0  I'm proud that Colorado joined 16 other states in suing the Trump administration adding to the pressure that led to this reversal. https://t.co/G9r0Oa1fqa

I am so proud to have the support of @CobaltAdvocates and look forward to continuing our work together to guarantee comprehensive universal access to reproductive health care -- including abortion. https://t.co/3MA98ZfWPR

White House turns on Fauci as disaster grows out of aggressive state openings >> https://t.co/RZxjF28EY6  Telling the truth should not be a punishable offense. Dr. Fauci is one of our nation's most respected public health officials and we need him now more than ever. https://t.co/SHtJJyKlnv

The only way to mitigate the climate crisis is to take steps now to cut our carbon emissions while also providing Americans with the affordable reliable electricity they need.  Learn more about my Clean Energy Innovation and Deployment Act now >> https://t.co/cbMHR3V1EJ https://t.co/AN0zN8QCsX

This pandemic is far from over -- yet the president and his administration continue to downplay the severity of this crisis.  TELL TRUMP: Stop ignoring scientists and public health officials and treat COVID-19 like the dangerous pandemic it is >> https://t.co/xtF0WbojaH https://t.co/5pHOHFuJEN

The Supreme Court attacked women's access to birth control -- so I'm fighting back >> https://t.co/2u6mkbQPFP  The Protect Access to Birth Control Act will repeal Trump's anti-choice rule. No employer should be able to tell a woman what she can and cannot do with her body.

As Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee Chair I'm working to hold online platforms like Facebook and Twitter accountable >> https://t.co/6ZRpm3qwZ6  It's critical they address the rise of COVID-19 misinformation online that is both troubling and dangerous to public health. https://t.co/0pgymu8viH

Supreme Court Undercuts Access To Birth Control Under Obamacare >> https://t.co/c9DaPM6Fbi  This is a huge setback for women's rights and bodily autonomy. I will continue to use my position as chair of the Pro-Choice Caucus to fight back. https://t.co/FPfpbyl7De

Trump officially moves to withdraw US from World Health Organization >> https://t.co/PW1d0jsZzr  This disastrous move doesn't go into effect until July 6 next year so it's critical we do everything we can to reverse this dangerous decision. https://t.co/e3vaHwLH9M

Last week I voted to create jobs by investing in our crumbling infrastructure expand internet access in rural and low-income communities and modernize the USPS >> https://t.co/YjMYTI9cm0  I work for you and am committed to keeping everyone employed safe and connected. https://t.co/hZshIDSuOh

The $600 federal unemployment benefit ends this month. GOP senators say enough already. >> https://t.co/2aXZFxpjRj  The pandemic hasn't ended -- so neither should your benefits. House Democrats already voted to extend until the end of the year. Now the Senate must do the same. https://t.co/9OI61wqk5u

DeGette to White House: Who is meddling in CDC health decisions? >> https://t.co/OOn4v4sZKA  Political interference should never impact the life-saving work of the CDC -- especially during a pandemic. We must unite around science safety and the health of the American people. https://t.co/FnGSiE328V

The pandemic is far from over Colorado so please celebrate safely today >> https://t.co/yTK62pRBSy  And remember: the Fourth of July isn't everyone's "Independence Day." For BIPOC women LGBTQIA+ immigrants and too many others the fight for freedom continues. https://t.co/6wbqZaptSi

Stronger pollution standards could save 143k lives >> https://t.co/IdZcAYsWld  Saving the environment saves lives. I will continue to prioritize public health over the profits of polluters -- and I hope my colleagues on the other side of the aisle will start doing the same. https://t.co/o808ilBO4M

After Trump proposed less testing -- not more -- I started working to hold this administration accountable for such a reckless and ill-informed approach to this pandemic.   LEARN MORE >> https://t.co/LhTxbxRtzN https://t.co/J9QIAVFFQf

Gov. Jared Polis appoints attorney general to investigate Elijah McClain’s death >> https://t.co/2oeCvyRdg5  Thanks to your ongoing activism @GovofCO is taking steps to secure justice for Elijah and his family. This is only a first step so we must continue building momentum. https://t.co/lmAhw3Inty

we need to vote for Democrats up and down the ticket. We need to elect John Hickenlooper to help turn the Senate blue and make sure our Colorado values are turned into action in the House the White House and the Senate."

My statement on tonight's Colorado primary election results: "Tonight is a great night for Colorado Democrats and we have to keep the momentum going into November. If you care about the environment and public lands about reproductive rights about police reform and civil rights
A big shout-out and appreciation tonight to Colorado's terrific #VoteByMail system and all the hardworking clerks and elections officials who make it work including @DenverElections. Thank you all!

Supreme Court strikes down Louisiana abortion clinic law >> https://t.co/FzaZgv4Fv3  An exciting victory today! This ruling will make it harder for anti-choice lawmakers to impose countless sham "health regulations" that make it impossible for abortion clinics to operate. https://t.co/hX1y9pRxMM

DeGette sponsors legislation granting $25 billion to research disrupted by pandemic >> https://t.co/KbGDeRbUyO  To continue being global leaders we must preserve the infrastructure for scientific research and innovation that is essential to public health and economic growth. https://t.co/gCoo5X2U3k

Trump Moves to End Federal Support for Testing Sites as US Sees Record Daily Spike in Covid-19 Infections >> https://t.co/LkTf3vpozo  This includes Colorado. We need an expansion of testing not a downright dangerous reduction. https://t.co/3B8uIcP4N4

51 years ago today the Stonewall Riots began.   It's important we lift up and celebrate the BIPOC and transgender activists who paved the way for the LGBTQIA+ rights movement including incredible pioneers like Marsha P. Johnson and Sylvia Rivera. https://t.co/d0faFQZBbG

Stalling on racial justice is not an option. The House has now passed the urgently needed Justice in Policing Act and I urge my colleagues in the Senate to follow suit.   READ MORE >> https://t.co/z2CG9AKl3H

Ignoring the impact of COVID-19 will not make it go away. We must continue addressing the urgent needs this crisis has created -- including support for our local museums and heritage tourism.  READ MORE >> https://t.co/ydMmKD4gvu

Tens of thousands of calls to re-examine Elijah McClain death inundate Aurora agencies >> https://t.co/Rn2P0gCAzZ  We cannot forget about Elijah McClain.   And we cannot rest until accountability justice and a restoration of public trust is achieved. https://t.co/fcJmJEnACf

Coloradans have been voting at home for 6 years. We will continue setting a wonderful example for the rest of the nation proving that voting by mail is easy accessible and very secure.  "No Fraud Isn’t Rampant in Colorado’s Mail-In Voting System" >> https://t.co/NAkN9AfjNj https://t.co/9pE9xlJKAx

The fight to protect our DREAMers is far from over and I am more committed than ever to protecting the over 14000 DACA recipients in Colorado.  "Colorado DACA recipients on their hopes fears after Supreme Court ruling" >> https://t.co/eu2UbthDmx https://t.co/PCy7jvZT3Z
ICYMI: Diana shared a special message at the Denver Pride parade this morning.   WATCH NOW >> https://t.co/K9xWtBZjrS

TOMORROW: Don't forget to tune in to Denver Pride's virtual parade  at 9:30am MST >> https://t.co/6SVpJ49FIt  Join me in celebrating our LGBTQIA+ friends and neighbors in Denver. The first Pride was a protest and the fight for full lived equality isn't over yet! https://t.co/JV6Jks7Ihc

Juneteenth is a time to celebrate the courage and resiliency of Black Americans and to recommit ourselves to the fight for racial justice -- a fight that is far from over.  CELEBRATE & LEARN VIRTUALLY >> https://t.co/3NC6vX8vuN https://t.co/eKnRzDhMjs
